Colors¶

class bandicoot.helper.tools.Colors¶

The Colors class stores six codes to color a string. It can be used to print messages inside a terminal prompt.

Examples

>>> print Colors.FAIL + "Error: it's a failure!" + Colors.ENDC
Attributes:
HEADER

Header color.

OKBLUE

Blue color for a success message

OKGREEN

Green color for a success message

WARNING

Warning color (yellow)

FAIL

Failing color (red)

ENDC

Code to disable coloring. Always add it after coloring a string.
advanced_wrap
ColorHandler
